thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: AinSeattle

author: AinSeattle
title: AinSeattle
text: I love Thriftbooks. I really, really do. But...I had a book on my wishlist that I got all the way into my cart but when I went to put in my credit card info, the cart suddenly turned empty. Someone else had purchased the book while I was entering my payment details. Talk about not a happy customer! I was able to purchase the same title a few weeks later but it didn't make for a good experience at the time. Other than that one time experience, all my experiences with Thriftbooks have been excellent!
